data.oai_dc:dc: Above ground biomass, Tierberg Research Station

The package contains data on wet and dry masses of subsamples of Karoo succulent and non-succulent plant species, the relationship between fresh mass and plant volume, and between fresh mass per unit area and projected canopy cover of vegetation. Data are from Tierberg Karoo Research Centre (TKRC) and the adjacent farm ?Argentina?. Above-ground biomass data were obtained by destructive sampling of 20 plots of 12.5 square meters, 12 plots 4 square meters and one plot 9 square meters in area on TKRC, and 6 plots of 12.5 square meters on Argentina. The package comprises seven data sheets as follows: Worksheet "1.subsample moisture", Worksheet "2.TKRC sp-covmass 1989", Worksheet "3.shrub-vol-mass", Worksheet "4.TKRC 5x2.5plots", Worksheet "5.Arg 5x2.5plots 1991", Worksheet "6.TKRC 3x3plot 1991", Worksheet "7.TKRC 2x2plots 1998"
